text: It seems to me that the natural world is the greatest source of excitement the greatest source of visual beauty the greatest source of intellectual interest. It is the greatest source of so much in life that makes life worth living.
author: David Attenborough

text: Beauty is only skin deep, but it's a valuable asset if you're poor or haven't any sense.
author: Vernon Howard

text: There is little premium in poetry in a world that thinks of Pound and Whitman as a weight and a sampler, not an Ezra, a Walt, a thing of beauty, a joy forever.
author: Anna Quindlen

text: Death is the mother of Beauty hence from her, alone, shall come fulfillment to our dreams and our desires.
author: Wallace Stevens

text: The fame that goes with wealth and beauty is fleeting and fragile intellectual superiority is a possession glorious and eternal.
author: Sallust
